explanation: [0-0] A man in a pink shirt and yellow scarf stands in front of the camera, holding a red plate. Behind him, another man in a white shirt and black pants can be seen. Colorful powder is scattered on the ground and the fence. The background shows a large building and a blue sky.

[0-9] The camera pans to reveal two more men in white shirts. The four of them smile as they dip their fingers into the powder on the plates and playfully smear it on each other's foreheads. The man holding the blue plate then shakes hands with the man holding the red plate. The man with the red plate dabs some powder on his own face, while the man with the blue plate raises a hand and waves.
